sentences.english: That night the smallest rabbit hid in the grass by the pool.
sentences.chinese: 那天晚上，最小的兔子藏在小池邊的矮樹叢裏。

sentences.english: The settlers say terrorists hide among the trees.
sentences.chinese: 定居者說有恐怖分子藏在樹叢裏。

sentences.english: A wolf leaped out of the bushes and took the hunter by surprise.
sentences.chinese: 一隻狼從樹叢中跳了出來，把獵人嚇了一跳。

sentences.english: Witnesses said the bomb hit the refugees as they were sheltering under trees and bushes.
sentences.chinese: 目擊者稱，難民在樹林和樹叢中避難時遭到炸彈襲擊。

sentences.english: He that fears every bush must never go a-birding.
sentences.chinese: 害怕進入矮樹叢的人決不會去打鳥。

sentences.english: To where it bent in the undergrowth.
sentences.chinese: 直到它在樹叢下邊轉彎。

sentences.english: There was cool, dappled sunlight under the trees.
sentences.chinese: 樹叢下很涼快，陽光只剩下斑斑點點。

sentences.english: The sea is near the forest in which there is this hotel.
sentences.chinese: 這家賓館建在樹叢之中，樹叢那邊是大海。

sentences.english: The sea is near the forest in which there is this hotel.
sentences.chinese: 這家賓館建在樹叢之中，樹叢那邊是大海。

sentences.english: There is a small house among the bosk.
sentences.chinese: 樹叢之中有一所小房子。

sentences.english: Then suddenly they vanished behind a great clump of trees growing in the middle of the Hippodrome .
sentences.chinese: 然後他們突然被跑馬場中間的一大片樹叢遮擋住了。

sentences.english: They were harboured in the woods.
Applause is sweeping through the trees.
sentences.chinese: 帷幕降下，樹叢間掌聲雷動。

sentences.english: I threw her digging stick into the pandanus bushes.
sentences.chinese: 我就把她的掘棒丟到林投樹叢去。

sentences.english: Loop network is transformed into branch network by the smallest growing groove method.
sentences.chinese: 應用最小生成樹叢法，將環狀管網轉變成枝狀管網。

sentences.english: NEYTIRI and JAKE crawl through the undergrowth. She points
sentences.chinese: 奈提莉和傑克爬過一個矮樹叢。

definition: green grass like cushion (idiom); green meadow so inviting to sleep on
